sentences.en: Antidote for overdose application: emetic, cathartic, alkalescent foods and beverages.
sentences.cn: 服用过量时所需用的解毒剂: 催吐, 泻药, 弱碱性食品、饮料.

sentences.en: But in general have a more scientific method emetic.
sentences.cn: 但一般还得采用更为科学的催吐剂法.

sentences.en: Caution: large doses of this remedy are emetic.
sentences.cn: 注意：大量服用这种药物会引致呕吐。

sentences.en: He was given an emetic ( medicine ) after eating poisonous berries.
sentences.cn: 他吃了有毒的浆果,已给了他 催吐剂.

sentences.en: He was given emetic ( medicine ) after eating poisonous berries.
sentences.cn: 他吃了有毒的浆果,已给了他 催吐剂.

sentences.en: Non - use of water has been used like manure and emetic rescue success story.
sentences.cn: 民间曾采用服用清水粪之类催吐而抢救成功的实例.

trans.tran_en: something that you eat or drink in order to make yourself vomit(= bring up food from your stomach )
